reviews.review_msg: Tests don't cover material learned. When you tell him this he doesn't consider it. Tried reporting him, nothing happened. I could speak farsi prior to taking this class and tried my hardest and really learned how to do everything taught, but tests and assignments were on things not taught. Really unfortunate experience taking this course with him.

Mehran is flexible, humorous, helpful and patient. However, this class is not suitable for a beginner.  The textbook is too advanced, with very little explanation and complicated exercises.  The final take-home exam contained too many new words and grammar never  mentioned in class. Work hard and Mehran will award you but you won't learn much.
